    $value[36]['jobDescription']
    <p>1- Obtain work orders from store keeper and chart out daily activities.<br>2 - Assist  manpower in shipping and receiving trucks.<br>3-  Check-in materials and match purchase orders with received items.<br>4 -  Determine items to be shipped or stored by reading and interpreting shipping orders.<br>5 - Move items from the receiving pallet to storage areas using forklifts or trolleys.<br>6-  Ensure that items are appropriately placed on shelves and racks according to their types and sizes.<br>7-  Make sure that appropriate information is supplied in the receiving log including lot and item identification numbers.<br>8- Refer to work orders and assist order pullers in pulling items from storage.<br>9- Match pulled pieces with work orders to ensure accuracy.<br>10-  Ensure that the dragged item is not damaged or broken.<br>11- Report any damaged items to the supervisor immediately.<br>12- Weigh and count items and place both weight and quantity information on boxes.<br>13- Handle packing activities such as putting items in boxes or crates and mark them correctly.<br>14- Move packaged items to the delivery pallet and load them onto delivery trucks.<br>15-Ensure the cleanliness and maintenance of the warehouse on a constant basis.</p>

    jobDescription => UTF-8 string (1451) "<p>§  Logistics Coordinator: Duties & Responsibilities</p><p>Ø &nbs...
    $value[49]['jobDescription']
    <p>§  Logistics Coordinator: Duties & Responsibilities</p><p>Ø  Follow up and coordinate on all incoming shipment from forwarders through phone calls and emails</p><p>Ø  Ensure that all shipments are coming on a timely manner in coordination with procurement pipeline</p><p>Ø  Request quotation from shipping agent/forwarders for all export shipment</p><p>Ø  Calculate export shipping cost and prepare comparison study and inform the concerned dept.</p><p>Ø  Once quotation is approved by sales, arrange export shipment with respective forwarder</p><p>Ø  Apply export documents such as Certificate of Origin by logging in in Dubai Chamber & Health Certificate via Dubai Municipality website</p><p>Ø  Follow up and coordinate with Dubai municipality regarding clearance and inspection</p><p>Ø  Prepare FIRS (Food Import Request System) in Dubai municipality website and submit to respective forwarder</p><p>Ø  Submit Insurance report of all shipment per month to Buhaleeba insurance dept.</p><p>Ø  Apply FITR for new items to import in Dubai Municipality Website</p><p>Ø  Apply item registration in Montaji (non-food item specifically cleaning items)</p><p>Ø  On-hand on overall process of Food Destruction ( expired & damage items)</p><p>Ø  Coordinates with Food Recycling Company and get approval as well as the approval from Dubai Municipality.</p>

    jobDescription => UTF-8 string (1486) "<p>§  Logistics Coordinator: Duties & Responsibilities</p><p>Ø&nbsp...
    $value[54]['jobDescription']
    <p>§  Logistics Coordinator: Duties & Responsibilities</p><p>Ø  Follow up and coordinate on all incoming shipments from forwarders through phone calls and emails</p><p>Ø  Ensure that all shipments are coming in a timely manner in coordination with the procurement pipeline</p><p>Ø  Request quotation from shipping agent/forwarders for all export shipment</p><p>Ø  Calculate export shipping cost and prepare a comparison study and inform the concerned dept.</p><p>Ø  Once the quotation is approved by sales, arrange export shipment with the respective forwarder</p><p>Ø  Apply export documents such as Certificate of Origin by logging in to Dubai Chamber & Health Certificate via the Dubai Municipality website</p><p>Ø  Follow up and coordinate with Dubai municipality regarding clearance and inspection</p><p>Ø  Prepare FIRS (Food Import Request System) on the Dubai municipality website and submit it to the respective forwarder</p><p>Ø  Submit an Insurance report of all shipments per month to the Buhaleeba insurance dept.</p><p>Ø  Apply FITR for new items to import in Dubai Municipality Website</p><p>Ø  Apply item registration in Montaji (non-food items specifically cleaning items)</p><p>Ø  On-hand on the overall process of Food Destruction ( expired & damaged items)</p><p>Ø  Coordinates with Food Recycling Company and get approval as well as approval from Dubai Municipality.</p>
    ⇄companyId => integer 4

    <p>1.      Responsible for procurement of Spare Parts for Equipment and Vehicles.</p><p>2.     Source and interview vendors; negotiate quality and costs.</p><p>3.     Sourcing of Spares.</p><p>4.    Co-ordinate with Procurement Dept. to create items in the system.</p><p>5.    Monitoring of minimum stock level.</p><p>6.    Total Inventory Mgmt.</p><p>7.     Read catalogs, drawings of automotive products to identify required parts.</p><p>8.     Determine replacement part stock numbers and prices.</p><p>9.     Make GRN and maintain stock.</p><p>10.    Coordinate with Service Advisors and provide spare parts cost and availability.</p><p>11.    Manage parts supply from Dealers and suppliers.</p><p>12.    Follow up and get the parts on time from available sources.</p><p>13.    Follow up the given quotes with Service Advisors and convert to business.</p><p>14.    Maintain proper accounts related to parts and procurements</p><p>15.    Purchase supply of products/materials.</p><p>16.    Determine the lowest cost for products/materials.</p><p>17.    Track and record orders.</p><p>18.    Receive orders and document arrivals.</p><p>19.    Manage supply base.</p><p>20.    Analyze market and delivery systems.</p><p>21.    Provide reports to management.</p>

    $value[83]['jobDescription']
    <p>-          Place orders through MR for materials based on the regular consumption/minimum stock level</p><p>-          Receive and dispatch materials in an organized and timely manner.</p><p>-          Inspect and reconcile the quantity, specification, quality, and conditions of the material received with purchase order/ delivery note.</p><p>-          Monitor the packing conditions of the goods received and file complaints on unsatisfactory deliveries and forward to the Store manager for further action.</p><p>-          Prepare the documents for received, authorized and recorded for all material received and dispatched.</p><p>-          Prepare and verify the Goods Received Note and Goods Transfer Note and get approval from the Store manager before processing.</p><p>-          Segregate the materials category wise and stock the items with receiving date label in the appropriate locations.</p><p>-          Perform inventory count every month and update in system</p><p>-          Periodical stock verification and ensure correctness of stock at all times.</p><p>-          Ensure adequate practices are followed for the safety of the store, materials and the manpower allocated in the store.</p><p>-          Maintain minimum inventory level and update the non-moving / slow moving / near expiry items to concern department head.</p><p>Ensure the store is kept clean and the inventory is organized.</p>

    <p>Follow up and coordinate on all incoming shipment for KSA from forwarders through phone calls and emails.</p><p>Follow up and coordinate with supplier and certification body for SABER certification.</p><p>Update all products in SFDA, ZAKT, FASHA before moving the shipment.</p><p>Ensure that all shipments are coming on a timely manner in coordination with procurement pipeline.</p><p> Request quotation from shipping agent/forwarders for all export shipment</p><p> Calculate export shipping cost and prepare comparison study and inform the concerned dept.</p><p> Once quotation is approved by sales, arrange export shipment with respective forwarder</p><p>Apply export documents such as Certificate of Origin by logging in in Dubai Chamber & Health Certificate via Dubai Municipality website</p><p> Follow up and coordinate with Dubai municipality regarding clearance and inspection.</p><p> Prepare FIRS (Food Import Request System) in Dubai municipality website and submit to respective forwarder.</p><p>Submit Insurance report of all shipment per month to Buhaleeba insurance dept.</p><p>Apply FITR for new items to import in Dubai Municipality Website</p><p>Apply item registration in Montaji (non-food item specifically cleaning items)</p><p>On-hand on overall process of Food Destruction (expired & damage items)</p><p>Coordinates with Food Recycling Company and get approval as well as the approval from Dubai Municipality.</p>

    jobDescription => string (1093) "<ul><li>Engaging with internal departments on regular basis to organize &amp...
    $value[106]['jobDescription']
    <ul><li>Engaging with internal departments on regular basis to organize & prioritize purchasing activities. </li><li>Ensuring the deliveries are arranged to all the locations properly on time without any delay.</li><li>Tracking all the requests properly from the departments to ensure the availability of material .</li><li>Ensuring the availability of material by following the approved list of brands & vendors. </li><li>Arranging the competitive quotation along with comparisons to help the department find cost effective sources of material. </li><li>Coordinating with the P/A section of accounts to update suppliers for the payments schedule. </li><li>Ensuring proper filing of all the agreements, suppliers data. </li><li>Ensuring proper registration of new vendors by attaining all the  required documents from the vendors</li><li>Tracking the materials in the market by considering the MOQ set by store & production. </li><li>Helping the department in having multiple  sourcing options for the materials. </li></ul><p> </p>

    <p>§  <strong>Logistics Coordinator: Duties & Responsibilities</strong></p><p>Ø  Follow up and coordinate on all incoming shipment from forwarders through phone calls and emails</p><p>Ø  Ensure that all shipments are coming on a timely manner in coordination with procurement pipeline</p><p>Ø  Request quotation from shipping agent/forwarders for all export shipment</p><p>Ø  Calculate export shipping cost and prepare comparison study and inform the concerned dept.</p><p>Ø  Once quotation is approved by sales, arrange export shipment with respective forwarder</p><p>Ø  Apply export documents such as Certificate of Origin by logging in in Dubai Chamber & Health Certificate via Dubai Municipality website</p><p>Ø  Follow up and coordinate with Dubai municipality regarding clearance and inspection</p><p>Ø  Prepare FIRS (Food Import Request System) in Dubai municipality website and submit to respective forwarder</p><p>Ø  Submit Insurance report of all shipment per month to Buhaleeba insurance dept.</p><p>Ø  Apply FITR for new items to import in Dubai Municipality Website</p><p>Ø  Apply item registration in Montaji (non-food item specifically cleaning items)</p><p>Ø  On-hand on overall process of Food Destruction ( expired & damage items)</p><p>Ø  Coordinates with Food Recycling Company and get approval as well as the approval from Dubai Municipality.</p><p> </p>

<li>-Process accounts and incoming payments.

<li>-Perform day-to-day financial transactions, including verifying, classifying, computing, posting, and recording accounts receivables data </li>
 
<li>-Prepare receipts, invoices, and bank deposits.</li>
 
<li>-Reconcile the accounts receivable ledger to ensure that all payments are accounted for and properly posted</li>
 
<li>-Generate financial statements and reports detailing accounts receivable status. 
</li>
 </ul>
</p>

<li>-Proficiency in Ms office</li>
 
<li>-Customer service oriented and excellent negotiation skills</li>
 
<li>-Accuracy and attention to details</li>
 
<li>-BS degree in Finance, Accounting, or Business Administration</li>
 
<li>-Immediate joiners are preferred from UAE/KSA only</li>
 </ul>
</p>

    <p> </p><p>·         Directly responsible for key accounts sales development & growth.</p><ul><li>Negotiating sales conditions and contracts of key customers – maintaining very good relations with their representatives.</li><li>Sales generation must be proportionately divided by contractual sales, and season wise sales and regular sales.</li></ul><p>·         Maintain excellent levels of internal and external customer service.</p><p>·         To prepare valuable analysis to provide focus on the growth of the business and identify the reasons for any de-growth in the business, in discussions with Category specialists & Sales Manager.</p><p>·         To monitor Competitor's activities in the Market by conducting random surveys and countering it by making necessary measures and attractive proposals to clients.</p><p>·         Working closely with category specialists and identifying tailored made solutions for the clients.</p><p>·         Ability to deliver high profile presentations to key clients which includes educative technical know-how of the products.</p><p>·         To monitor MOM sales of key accounts and take adjustive actions.</p><p>·         To forecast demand per each account is mandatory.</p><p>·         Generating 10 new key leads monthly.</p><p>·         Responsible to ensure payment collections are done on timely basis.</p><p>·         Ensuring key clients are kept abreast of any developments initiated/approved by the management or category specialists.</p><p>·         Must be able to cross sell and up sell.</p><p>·         Must keep a track of CRM data on regular basis.</p>

    <p>1- Obtain work orders from store keeper and chart out daily activities.<br>2 - Assist outside labor in shipping and receiving trucks.<br>3-  Check-in materials and match purchase orders with received items.<br>4 -  Determine items to be shipped or stored by reading and interpreting shipping orders.<br>5 - Move items from the receiving pallet to storage areas using forklifts or trolleys.<br>6-  Ensure that items are appropriately placed on shelves and racks according to their types and sizes.<br>7-  Make sure that appropriate information is supplied in the receiving log including lot and item identification numbers.<br>8- Refer to work orders and assist order pullers in pulling items from storage.<br>9- Match pulled pieces with work orders to ensure accuracy.<br>10-  Ensure that the dragged item is not damaged or broken.<br>11- Report any damaged items to the supervisor immediately.<br>12- Weigh and count items and place both weight and quantity information on boxes.<br>13- Handle packing activities such as putting items in boxes or crates and labeling them correctly.<br>14- Move packaged items to the delivery pallet and load them onto delivery trucks.<br>15-Ensure the cleanliness and maintenance of the warehouse on a constant basis.</p>

    <ul><li>We are hiring a detail-oriented, confident, and organized procurement executive with F&B Background to oversee purchases and develop new contracts. In this position, you will play a key role in procuring high-quality and cost-efficient supplies for our organization. You will follow procurement procedures, and maintain an updated list of suppliers. </li></ul><p>Responsibilities: </p><ul><li>-Engaging with internal departments on regular basis to organize & prioritize purchasing activities. </li><li>-Ensuring the deliveries are arranged to all the locations properly on time without any delay.</li><li>-Tracking all the requests appropriately from the departments to ensure the availability of material.</li><li>-Ensuring the availability of the material by following the approved list of brands & vendors. </li><li>-Arranging the competitive quotation along with comparisons to help the department find cost-effective sources of material. </li><li>-Coordinating with the P/A section of accounts to update suppliers on the payments schedule. </li><li>-Ensuring proper filing of all the agreements and suppliers' data. </li><li>-Ensuring proper registration of new vendors by attaining all the  required documents from the vendors</li><li>-Tracking the materials in the market by considering the MOQ set by store & production. </li></ul><p>-Assist the department in having multiple  sourcing options for the materials.</p><p>Requirements:</p><p>-In-depth knowledge of F&B Procurement activities</p><p>-Must have excellent English communication skills</p><p>-A confident and go-getter attitude.</p><p>-Driving License, is an added advantage</p>
